page.title: 16PERTH HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: The pupils of this school enjoy a wide variety of extra-curricular activities. Recently staff and pupils joined forces to produce{Gilbert and {Sullivan's "Trial by Jury".}A group of talented pupils was brought together to perform a selection of musical items. Pupils enjoy both active and passive activities with success in football, cricket,hockey,dance,golf,badminton and in debating,chess,computing and drama. On Tuesday evenings,pupils take part in{Youth Club}activities. Two recent successes are:{British Senior Girls' and{Scottish Senior Boys' Badminton {Titles.}Many sports are catered for as well as non-sporting activities. The extensive variety of activities offered at{P.H.S.}are beneficial to pupils socially and educationally.
